summary: Iteration 22 - Production Module Phase 4 (Order Sheet Tabbed Views) and Phase 5 (Detailed Production Entry Forms) Testing: All 10 features tested and PASSED. Production Control Center with 7-stage pipeline, Order Sheet Detail with 3 tabs (Order-wise, Product-wise, Machine-wise), Work Order Detail with stage-specific production entry forms, and DPR Reports all working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Used existing data: 1 Order Sheet (OS-20260123-6FAA76), 12 Work Orders across 7 stages, 3 machines, 1 production entry on Coating Line 1 - Main
context_for_next_testing_agent: Production Module Phase 4 and Phase 5 are complete. Order Sheet Detail has 3 tabs (Order-wise, Product-wise, Machine-wise) with rich visualizations. Work Order Detail shows stage-specific production entry forms with Coating fields (Jumbo Roll Width/Length/Weight, SQM Produced, Base Film Used, etc.). DPR Reports has Daily/Weekly/Stage tabs.

1_production_dashboard_7_stage_pipeline.details: Production Control Center loads with 7-Stage Manufacturing Workflow. Summary cards: Total SKUs (2), PCS in Process (8995), SQM in Process (3000), Overall Progress (0%), Machines (3). Pipeline shows all 7 stages: Coating, Slitting, Rewinding, Cutting, Packing, Ready to Deliver, Delivered with pending/active counts.

2_order_sheet_detail_3_tabs.details: Order Sheet Detail page (OS-20260123-6FAA76) loads with 3 tabs: Order-wise, Product-wise, Machine-wise. Shows Test Manufacturing Co. with 2 items, 0% Complete.

3_order_wise_tab.details: Order-wise tab shows 'Orders & Status' with sales order details, progress bar, work order list with WO numbers, stages (Coating, Cutting, Packing), and status badges. Shows 11 Pending, 1 In Progress, 0 Completed.

4_product_wise_tab_visual_pipeline.details: Product-wise tab shows 'Product-wise Stages' with visual pipeline for each product. Displays 2 products: BOPP Tape 48mm x 65m and Masking Tape 24mm x 20m. Each product shows 6-stage pipeline (Coating → Slitting → Rewinding → Cutting → Packing → Ready) with color-coded status indicators.

5_machine_wise_tab_utilization.details: Machine-wise tab shows 'Machine-wise Load' with machine utilization data. Displays Coating Line 1 - Main with 1 work order assigned, Target: 1000, Completed: 5, Remaining: 995, 1% Utilization, 0 Pending, 1 Active, 0 Done.

6_work_order_detail_page.details: Work Order Detail page loads for WO-COA-20260123-5099 (BOPP Tape 48mm x 65m • Coating). Shows Target: 1000 pcs, Completed: 5, Wastage: 0 (0%), Machine: Coating Line 1 - Main, 0.5% Complete progress bar. Production Entries table shows existing entry.

7_add_production_entry_button.details: Add Production Entry button is visible and clickable on Work Order Detail page. Opens stage-specific form dialog when clicked.

8_coating_stage_entry_form.details: Coating Entry form dialog shows stage-specific fields: Time & Operator section (Operator ID, Start Time, End Time), Input & Output Quantities section, Coating Stage Details section with Jumbo Roll Width (mm), Jumbo Roll Length (m), Jumbo Roll Weight (kg), SQM Produced, Base Film Used (kg), Adhesive Used (kg), Liner Used (kg), Coating Speed (m/min), Drying Temp (°C).

9_wastage_tracking_section.details: Wastage Tracking section displays in the entry form with Wastage Quantity input and Wastage Reason dropdown (Machine Setup, Quality Defect, Material Issue, Edge Trim, Adhesive Issue, Core Defect, Other). Shows calculated wastage percentage when values are entered.

10_dpr_reports_page.details: DPR Reports page loads with Daily Report tab showing summary cards (Total Entries: 1, Work Orders Active: 1, Total Output: 5, Total Wastage: 0, Hours Worked: 0). Stage-wise Production Summary table shows Coating stage data. Weekly Trend tab shows 7-day summary with Daily Trend table.
